data:
Here is the table of possible risks and their classifications with mitigation plans:

| Risk | Classification | Mitigation Plan |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Negative public opinion on the use of AI | High | Implement transparency measures, provide clear information about AI usage, and engage with stakeholders to address concerns |
| Energy consumption | Medium | Optimize platform architecture, use energy-efficient technologies, and monitor energy consumption |
| Dependence on AI model providers | High | Develop in-house AI models, diversify AI model providers, and implement contingency plans for AI model failures |
| Unfriendly interfaces | Medium | Conduct regular user testing, gather feedback, and iterate on UI/UX design |
| Lack of feedback | Medium | Implement feedback mechanisms, provide clear instructions, and encourage users to provide feedback |
| Poor prioritization of functionalities | Medium | Prioritize functionalities based on user feedback, conduct regular user testing, and iterate on platform development |
| Low visibility on social media | Low | Implement social media marketing strategies, engage with stakeholders, and monitor social media analytics |
| Difficulty in measuring training quality | Medium | Implement evaluation mechanisms, provide clear instructions, and encourage users to provide feedback |
| AI use regulations | High | Stay up-to-date with AI regulations, implement compliance measures, and engage with stakeholders to address concerns |
| Data breach | High | Implement strong encryption and access controls, conduct regular security audits, and monitor for suspicious activity |
| System downtime | Medium | Ensure robust backup and recovery plans, conduct regular system testing, and monitor system performance |
| User interface issues | Medium | Conduct regular user testing, gather feedback, and iterate on UI/UX design |
| Cyber attacks | High | Implement strong encryption and access controls, conduct regular security audits, and monitor for suspicious activity |
| Inadequate training for workers | Medium | Provide clear instructions, conduct regular training sessions, and monitor worker performance |

Note: The classification of risks as High, Medium, or Low is subjective and may vary depending on the specific context and stakeholders involved.
